price: Wancan Yanã daga lãbãran alƙaryõyi. Munã bã ka lãbãrinsu, daga gare su akwai wanda ke tsaye da kuma girbabbe.*
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ مِنۡ أَنۢبَآءِ ٱلۡقُرَىٰ نَقُصُّهُۥ عَلَيۡكَۖ مِنۡهَا قَآئِمٞ وَحَصِيدٞ
footnotes: * Daga nan zuwa ƙarshen sũra ta'alĩƙi ne dõmin farkarwa. Mai tsayi, watau tana nan tsaye, Alãmõminta ba su ɓãce ba, kuma akwai waɗanda suka halaka kamar karan da aka girbe.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: dhālika min anbāi al-qurā naquṣṣuhu ʿalayka min'hā qāimun waḥaṣīdun
